articles.title: JP Duminy called up as consultant to Proteas for T20 World Cup | Sport
articles.description: Cricket South Africa has named JP Duminy and Justin Sammons as specialist consultants to the Proteas for the T20 World Cup.
articles.content:
Cricket South Africa (CSA) on Friday named JP Duminy and Justin Sammons as specialist consultants to the Proteas for the T20 World Cup to be played in Oman and the United Arab Emirates next month.
